General.Name: Blackhawk Growth Corp
General.Description: Blackhawk Growth Corp is a publicly owned investment manager. It invests in public equity and fixed income markets across North America. It focuses on investing in cannabis and CBD industries, in both Canada and the United States. The company was formerly known as Blackhawk Resource Corp. Blackhawk Growth Corp was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 650, 816 - 7 Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 1A1
